markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">[Feet to Fins](/Spells.aspx?ID=113)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 337 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Deities**
[Besmara](/Deities.aspx?ID=32), [Dagon](/Deities.aspx?ID=75), [Picoperi](/Deities.aspx?ID=266), [Ragadahn](/Deities.aspx?ID=99), [Seafarer's Hope](/Deities.aspx?ID=255), [Sobek](/Deities.aspx?ID=60), [Ylimancha](/Deities.aspx?ID=132)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

The target's feet transform into fins, improving mobility in the water but reducing it on land. The target gains a swim Speed equal to its normal land Speed, but its land Speed becomes 5 feet.

---
**Heightened (6th)** The spell lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.
name: Feet to Fins

summary: Turn a creature's feet into fins, enabling it swim but slowing it on land.
summary_markdown: Turn a creature's feet into fins, enabling it swim but slowing it on land.
text: Feet to Fins Source Core Rulebook pg. 337 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Deities Besmara, Dagon, Picoperi, Ragadahn, Seafarer's Hope, Sobek, Ylimancha Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 willing creature Duration 10 minutes --- The target's feet transform into fins, improving mobility in the water but reducing it on land. The target gains a swim Speed equal to its normal land Speed, but its land Speed becomes 5 feet. --- Heightened (6th) The spell lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.
